abstracts.cdata!:
The project's main objective is to
            support the Ministry of Construction (MOC)'s
            maintenance program, which is intended to forestall further
            deterioration of the 2,900 mile road network under MOC
            responsibility.  It consists of the periodic maintenance and
            technical assistance planned for the first three years of
            the MOC's 1983/4-1986/7 main road maintenance program,
            as well as the first year of its vehicle and equipment fleet
            renewal program. Specifically, it provides for asphaltic
            concrete overlay of existing pavement on about 160 miles of
            roads; asphaltic sealing and resealing with double surface
            treatment of some 360 miles of roads; and preparatory works
            as well as the procurement of utility vehicles, dumptrucks,
            and other equipment and about 245 man-months of technical
            assistance to strengthen MOC's planning, maintenance
            and equipment management and training capabilities.
